name: Dilated
description:
In the far future, humanity lost control over technologies. Buildings began to expand incredibly, structures extend for hundreds of kilometers. No one knows when it started and how far it goes. Guard systems gone insane attacking any human.

The only way to stop this mess is to find the masterkey and reboot all systems. Rumors say that it is located somewhere on highest levels of structure. You play as a solitary cyborg armed with eye-laser and rocket boots. All that remains to you is to reach highest levels…

Basically, goal of the game is to get as high as possible (score points aka "levels" are obtained for taken height), but you can go anywhere, world is infinite in all directions.

This game was mostly inspired by Tsutomu Nihei's manga "Blame!"

Controls

← → — walk left/right

↑ ↓— look up/down

z - jump/activate rocket boots (while in air)

x - shoot
